text: Hanchu vântîrton minlina han a bekul a tuma. Nisa munthuma semin munkhat, thâ munthuma semin munkhat, le ârsingei munthuma semin munkhat chu dêngkhoiin an oma, ma ngei vâr hah munthuma semin munkhat ajîng theina rangin; sûn le jân khom munthuma semin munkhat chu vâr om khâi mak.8:12: Isa 13:10; Ezek 32:7; Joel 2:10,31; 3:15
